title: How to Make Jolly Rancher Jello Shots

steps.headline: Prepare the shot cups.
steps.description: Make individual rows of 2-ounce plastic shot cups on a baking sheet.

steps.headline: Dissolve the gelatin into the boiling water in a large bowl.
Measure and pour the rest of the ingredients into the bowl.
steps.description: Thoroughly stir until well mixed. Allow the mixture to cool a little.

steps.headline: Carefully pour the Jello mixture into the shot cups.
Chill in the refrigerator.
steps.description: Allow the mixture to fully set and harden, for at least four hours or overnight.

tyn: 2 oz plastic Jello shot cups, with lids
text: Prepare the shot cups. Make individual rows of 2-ounce plastic shot cups on a baking sheet. Dissolve the gelatin into the boiling water in a large bowl.  Measure and pour the rest of the ingredients into the bowl. Thoroughly stir until well mixed. Allow the mixture to cool a little. Carefully pour the Jello mixture into the shot cups.  Chill in the refrigerator. Allow the mixture to fully set and harden, for at least four hours or overnight. Finished.
sentences: Make individual rows of 2-ounce plastic shot cups on a baking sheet.
Dissolve the gelatin into the boiling water in a large bowl.
Measure and pour the rest of the ingredients into the bowl.
Allow the mixture to cool a little.
Carefully pour the Jello mixture into the shot cups.
Allow the mixture to fully set and harden, for at least four hours or overnight.
